title: Emotional Inquiry-Based Management Development Diagnostic Workshop: Short-Term Intensive Course for Mathematics Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in mathematics and basic organizational management concepts
context.additional_context: Diagnostic program combining mathematical domain expertise and managerial competencies for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Participants can identify at least three math-based problem-solving points within an organization using emotional inquiry techniques.
Learners can collaboratively design two specific cases of applying mathematical expertise with managers from other departments.
Participating teams can develop a SWOT analysis-based roadmap for mathematics education aligned with organizational missions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
